name: Classic Pong (ZachCreates)
description:
This is a quick game I decided to make. This is a remake of Pong, the classic and fun local coop game! I hope you all enjoy the game! (:

If the game is not working, try playing on Chrome. 

This game was made by myself mostly. I do have to give credit to Julian K. Jarboe! They were the creators of that epic music in the game. I found this music in one of their packs. I'll leave a link to it here because it was super cool! https://sissyfist.itch.io/retro-synthwave-videogame-music
